name: Inciativas
query:
select l.name,l.first_name,l.last_name,l.company_name,
( select concat(phone," - ",mobile_no) from `tabContact` where name in (select parent from `tabDynamic Link` where link_name=l.name) limit 1) as Phone,
l.nis,l.ruc,(select note from `tabCRM Note`  where parent=l.name  order by creation desc limit 1)  Observaciones,l.creation as Creado,l.owner as Creado_por,l.modified_by as Aprobado_por,l.workflow_state as Estado,l.cedula,l.sales_person as Vendedor,l.cliente,l.territory as Departamento,l.barrio,l.coordinador,
l.address_line1 as Direccion,
(select t2.nodo from `tabSubscription`  t1 
inner join `tabSubscription Plan Detail`  t2 on  t2.parent = t1.name
where t1.party=l.cliente limit 1) nodo,l.tipo_de_servicio_ as Servicio,l.monto_a_contratar
from `tabLead` l
where month(l.creation)=%(mes)s and 
year(l.creation)=%(ano)s
